alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Jefferson; Johnson; Laurens; Treutlen; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 5:29AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Heavy rain and strong winds will impact portions of northeastern Laurens, Emanuel, northern Treutlen, southeastern Washington, eastern Johnson and southeastern Jefferson Counties through 615 AM EST... At 528 AM EST, a line of heavy showers and embedded thunderstorms extended from near Louisville to near New Home to near Minter, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Louisville, Wadley, Twin City, Adrian, Stillmore, Oak Park, Bartow, Garfield, Summertown, Nunez, Kite, Covena, Modoc, Canoochee, Rockledge, Norristown, Minter, Moxley and Dellwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Emanuel; Jefferson; Johnson; Laurens; Treutlen; Washington
